description:
Mikan is an official Alice Academy student at last! Now she has to be judged under the Star Ranking System, Alice Academy`s student evaluation system. The way students are treated differs drastically depending on their rank. What will Mikan`s fate be?
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Hoshi Kaikyuu wa Severe Ya naa
The Star Ranking System Sure Can Be Severe
星階級はシビアやなぁ
